title: BackJoy Trigger Point Massager
description: The BackJoy Trigger Point Massager is lightweight, durable and simple to use. Simply hook the tool over your shoulder or around your body and use the 11 therapy knobs to massage and release tight or achy muscles. Relieve pain through direct pressure in your back, neck, shoulders, and anywhere else your body holds tension. The unique multi-purpose handles offer full control when navigating the device over your body. Therapy knobs provide deep trigger point release.

asset.author: BackJoy
asset.description: The BackJoy Trigger Point Massager is lightweight, durable and simple to use. Simply hook the tool over your shoulder or around your body and use the 11 therapy knobs to massage and release tight or achy muscles. transcripts:
Do you suffer from back pain, headaches or muscle soreness or tension from stress? Now you can. Now you can have a massage everyday with the BackJoy trigger point massager. This self massage tool treats your entire body from head to tow. Use the trigger point messager's 11 therapeutic knobs and easy to reach design to relive tension from you neck, back, and shoulders. Or message you achy feet without bending over. With the trigger point messager, there are endless ways to treat every muscle in your body. Here's how it works. The trigger point messager applies direct pressure exactly where you're experiencing pain or tightness. When the compression is released, oxygenated blood begins to flow  and you'll feel your muscles relax immediately relieving pain.

You control the amount of pressure-- soft and soothing or deep pressure. And determine the exact spot that requires treatment. Using the BackJoy trigger point messager is easy. The patented design helps you apply deep pressure with little effort. With the trigger point messager, you'll have a durable, portable, and effective way to relieve back pain and unwanted tension throughout your entire body. You'll feel better. Help improve your posture and live each day more comfortably. Try the BackJoy trigger point messager today.
